title: November 9
author: Colleen Hoover
description: Sunshine State trivia buff Serge A. Storms loves eliminating jerks and pests. His drug-addled partner Coleman loves cartoons. Hot stripper Sharon Rhodes loves cocaine, especially when purchased with rich dead men's money.

reviews.name: Lary Pias
reviews.review: Similar to Carl Hiaasen, Tim Dorsey takes crazy characters doing unbelievable and wacky things in a south Florida setting and watch the carnage pile up.  If you took the author&rsquo;s name off the cover of this book

title: The It Girl
author: Ruth Ware
description: A humid summer night in Gibraltar. Lawyer Spike Sanguinetti finds Solomon Hassan, an old school friend, waiting on his doorstep. Solomon has been accused of murdering a Spanish girl, Esperanza, in Tangiers - slicing her throat on a beach. He has managed to skip across the Straits but the Moroccan authorities want him back.

reviews.name: Imogen Church
reviews.review: Charcter development and location descriptives set in a good story line make a good read for me this book has all 3. Not many books use the Rock as a setting and that is what initially interested me.

title: Escape
author: James Patterson, David Ellis
description: As Chicago PD's special-ops leader, Detective Billy Harney knows well that money is not the only valuable currency. The filthy rich man he's investigating is down to his last twenty million. He's also being held in jail.

reviews.name: Edoardo Ballerini
reviews.review: Received Escape in the mail Tuesday afternoon and finished reading it last night (Wednesday). Loved it along with others in this series - The Red Book and The Black Book. Not giving away anything, but this thriller ending left it wide open for at least another Billy Harney and his new task force book.

title: Tom Clancy Zero Hour
author: Don Bentley
description: Everyone loves the Graces. Fenrin, Thalia, and Summer Grace are attractive, rich, and glamorous, and they've cast a spell over their high school—and their entire town. They're also rumored to have powerful connections all over the world. If you're not in love with one of them, you want to be one of them. This is especially true for River: the new girl at school. River's different from the rest of the horde that both revere and fear the Grace family.

reviews.name: Scott Brick
reviews.review: It can sometimes confuse you, but beside that is pretty good.

title: The Omega Factor
author: Steve Berry
description: Twenty-six-year-old Cat Kinsella overcame a troubled childhood to become a Detective Constable with the Metropolitan Police Force, but she’s never been able to banish these ghosts. When she’s called to the scene of a murder in Islington, not far from the pub her estranged father still runs, she discovers that Alice Lapaine, a young housewife who didn’t get out much, has been found strangled.

reviews.name: Piara Da
reviews.review: Sweet Little Lies by Caz Frear is a story that will keep you turning pages. There is murder, intrigue, family conflict, baby selling and several sub plots that will keep you guessing and trying to determine 'who done it'

title: Nightwork
author: Nora Roberts
description: Ella hates London. She misses her old life in Spain and is struggling to get over her past—until she meets Zac. He's always loved her but isn't meant to be part of her story. Not this time.

reviews.name: Will Damron
reviews.review: Best read I've had in a while! Hard to put it down!

title: Dream Town (Archer Series #3)
author: David Baldacci
description: Inspector Harry Hole of the Oslo Crime Squad is dispatched to Sydney to observe a murder case.  Harry is free to offer assistance, but he has firm instructions to stay out of trouble. The victim is a twenty-three year old Norwegian woman who is a minor celebrity back home.

reviews.name: Edoardo Ballerini
reviews.review: Jo Nesbo's first Harry Hole novel is interesting, charming, surprising, sad, funny, and unexpectedly better than advertised. Reading a Norwegian's foray into Australian life is intriguing

title: Clive Cussler's Dark Vector
author: Graham Brown
description: Maneuvering his way through a minefield of political, military, and personal agendas and vendettas, Reinhardt knows that someone is leaving a trail of dead bodies to cover their tracks. But those bloody tracks may lead Reinhardt to a secret hidden within the ranks of the powerful that they will do anything to keep.

reviews.name: Brick Scott
reviews.review: The main character spends as much time in the book lamenting his past as he does investigating the crime. The woe is me parts became so prevalent I just started skipping pages to get through it.

title: James Patterson by James Patterson: The Stories of My Life
author: James Patterson
description: A phone call at two thirty in the morning is never good news. Lucie Montgomery's semiestranged brother, Eli, calls her in France to tell her their father, Leland, has been killed in a hunting accident on the family's five-hundred-acre Virginia vineyard just as the fall harvest is about to begin. By the time he calls, Eli has already made funeral arrangements with what Lucie argues is indecent haste.

reviews.name: Massachusetts
reviews.review: I love the way James makes you feel like you are a trusted friend that he is confiding in. Really enjoy his personal approach. He has definitely lived a full life.

title: The Paris Apartment
author: Lucy Foley
description: Jess needs a fresh start. She's broke and alone, and she's just left her job under less than ideal circumstances. Her half-brother Ben didn't sound thrilled when she asked if she could crash with him for a bit, but he didn't say no, and surely everything will look better from Paris

reviews.name: Charlie Anson
reviews.review: A real page turner mystery told from multiple perspectives. This read will have you second guessing everyone!
